content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Coal Mine at position (41, -82)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position 41, -82) 
-  Wooden chest (position 40.5, -83.5) 
-  Wooden chest (position 41.5, -83.5) 
-  Burner inserter (position 39.5, -81.5)

### Furnace at position (0, 0)
Consists of followng entiities
-  Stone furnace (position 0, 0)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when extracting from a chest
-  Ensure the chest is not empty before attempting to extract items
-  Make sure the agent has the required items in its inventory to extract

### Errors when inserting into a furnace
-  Ensure the furnace is not full before attempting to insert items
-  Make sure the furnace has the required ingredients to smelt

### Errors when inserting into a mining drill
-  Ensure the mining drill is not full before attempting to insert items
-  Make sure the mining drill has the required fuel to operate

### Errors due to full chests
-  Empty the chest at the drop position to continue mining
-  Ensure the chest is not full before attempting to drop items into it

### NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent in this report. 
Important variables that have been assigned:
* `coal_chest`: a chest entity
* `drill`: a burner mining drill entity
* `furnace`: a stone furnace entity
* `inserter`: a burner inserter entity
* `wooden_chest`: a chest entity 
Note: The types of these variables are not explicitly defined in the execution logs, but they can be inferred based on their usage.
